synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: H4dobdc (0.099 g, 0.50 mmol), Zn(NO3)2·6H2O (0.149 g, 0.50 mmol), N,N′-dimethylformamide (DMF, 6.0 mL), H2O (0.20 mL)

synthesis_conditions.activation: The as-synthesized crystals of UTSA-74 were activated to remove solvent molecules in situ using the gas adsorption apparatus Belsorp-max at 200 °C under high vacuum for 2 h.
The as-synthesized crystals of UTSA-74 were activated to remove solvent molecules in situ using the gas adsorption apparatus Belsorp-max at 200 °C under high vacuum for 2 h.
synthesis_conditions.additional_step: Gradual loading of CO2 into the UTSA-74a sample up to 100 kPa at 298 K leads to the formation of UTSA-74⊃CO2, which were transferred into glovebox, and sealed into the capillary tubes under CO2 atmosphere.
